item.title: a bit about me
item.description: Welcome! My name is Harshavardhan (Harsha) - I go to Duke, where I study math and computer science. Among many things, I’m interested in the future of healthcare and in understanding how people think (and how to optimize the decisions that we make). One of my dreams is to build a platform for people like you and me, that can democratize inaccessible and uninterpretable tools to complement our everyday decision-making.

item.title: what i've done (and doing)
item.description: Data Science Internship I was a data science intern at Redhorse Corporation , a small government contractor/consulting firm headquarted in San Diego. I worked in a team to build a web application (using React and Flask), that could create a “subject matter expert” on any topic related to government processes. We built a containerized app using Docker and AWS that scraped data off of the Department of Defense website and applied various natural language processing algorithms like coreference resolution, named entity recognition, etc.
